title: Poster, "IBM Rebus", designed 1981
signed: Signed in grey ink in print, lower right:  Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in gray, lower left corner:  c [encircled] Copyright IBM Corporation, 1991.  All Rights Reserved./ tm Trademark of the IBM Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.
description: On a black ground, across and above center of sheet, an eye with brown iris and orange eyebrow, a vertically placed yellow jacket bee with pink, circular antenae and green wings, and a horizontally stripped blue and black M.
